title: AMA with Tascha from Alpha Finance
description:

AMA with Tascha from Alpha Finance

Alpha Finance Lab (https://alphafinance.io/ ) is an ecosystem of DeFi products including Alpha Homora (https://homora.alphafinance.io/​), which released its V2 upgrade in January 2021. Tascha is Project Lead and Co-Founder.
